column3: Earthing Shall be provided with one internal and two external earthingterminals of Brass/SS (M4/M6) dimensions with screw/bolt & plain washersand shall be located at a place easy to approach and carry out maintenance.

The FLP MCP shall be provided with two numbers 3/4" ET/BSC doublecompression brass nickel FLP cable gland and additional one no. plug ofsame material suitable for Gas Groups IIA, IIB & IIC for the cable entries andshall be approved by CIMFR/ PESO.

Actuator Type shall be Red color mushroom head press & spring return typeactuator. Allen bolts shall be provided with retainable standard Allen typehexagonal socket head stainless steel screws to ensure they don't fall offduring maintenance.
